predicate.note: Frames file for 'vacate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: weird usage
example.text: SciMed Life Systems Inc., Minneapolis, said a federal appeals court vacated an earlier summary judgment in its favor.
example.arg: an earlier summary judgment in its favor

example.name: more normal
example.text: After John ate a big bowl of chili beans, everyone else vacated the room.
example.arg: After John ate a big bowl of chili beans
